gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 118, Bulls 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite Zach LaVines career-high 51 points (19-32 FG, 7-13 3PM), the Bulls fall to the Pistons, 118-102. Cade Cunningham led the way for the Pistons with 25 points, four rebounds and 10 assists, while Jalen Duren added 23 points (9-11 FG), 15 rebounds and five assists in the victory. DeMar DeRozan tallied 20 points and four assists for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Pistons improve to 2-1 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 1-2.
